name: json-table-viewer
description: A powerful Web Component for visualizing complex JSON data in table format with interactive features

scripts.validate: npm run validate:css && npm run validate:js
scripts.validate:css: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const csstree = require('css-tree'); csstree.parse(fs.readFileSync('styles.css', 'utf8')); console.log('✓ CSS is valid');"
scripts.validate:js: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const acorn = require('acorn'); ['json-table-viewer.js'].forEach(file => { acorn.parse(fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf8'), { ecmaVersion: 2020 }); console.log('✓', file, 'is valid'); });"

author: Keith Hall
